attributes.action: Make laws to ringfence funds. So employers cannot use it for any other purpose.
attributes.background: Companies are continously using the employees pension fund to prop up profits, make it illeagal to use this fund for anything other than pensions.

rejection.details: We're not sure exactly what action you would like the Government or Parliament to take. You could start a petition calling on Parliament to change the law to ring fence pension funds, so companies can't use this money for other purposes.
